name: All You Have Is A Hammer
name_original: All You Have Is A Hammer
description:
Hit the nails in order to drop the hammer.

Caution: not everything is as it seems, since if all you have is a hammer - everything looks like a nail.

Created for GitHub Game Off 2022 (theme: cliché)

Source code is at: https://github.com/tjol/all-you-hammer
